name: PowerIt
description:
This tower-defense tasks the user to power their defences using the power cube, an interactible object that is dragged across the screen to enable defenses and collect rewards from downed enemies!

This 'game' is merely a portfolio piece, and a way for me to develop my skills. By no means this is a polished project, it will likely contain bugs and suffer from a lack of balancing :) You have been warned !

Inspired by BTD games, and a Brackey's 2017 Game Jam submission.
